headline: Looking For Yields: Avista, Cogent Communications, And Mondelez Are Consistent Moneymakers
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. Avista, Cogent Communications, and Mondelez International have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend ...

headline: Buy Wide-Moat PepsiCo: Activist Involvement Is Icing On The Cake
summary: PepsiCo has underperformed the S&P 500 and key peers over 5- and 10-year periods, with notably lower total returns. Read why I rate PEP stock a Buy now.
